questions.question: Which sensor is used for measuring distance?

explanations.a: Incorrect: PIR detects motion, not distance.
explanations.b: Correct: Ultrasonic sensors measure distance using sound waves.
explanations.d: Incorrect: MQ135 detects air quality gases.

questions.question: DHT sensor measures which two parameters?

explanations.a: Correct: DHT11/DHT22 measure temperature and humidity.
explanations.c: Incorrect: Gas sensors like MQ series measure gas.
explanations.d: Incorrect: These belong to light sensors.

questions.question: Soil moisture sensor gives which type of output?

explanations.b: Incorrect: Some also have digital comparator output.
explanations.c: Correct: Most soil sensors provide analog (%) and digital (threshold).

questions.question: MQ135 sensor is used for detecting ___.

explanations.c: Correct: MQ135 detects CO2, NH3, alcohol, benzene, etc.

explanations.b: Incorrect: IR is used by IR sensors, not ultrasonic.
explanations.c: Incorrect: Microwaves belong to radar sensors.
explanations.d: Correct: Ultrasonic sensors use sound waves above 20 kHz.

questions.question: PIR detects motion using which type of radiation?

explanations.b: Incorrect: PIR does not detect visible light.
explanations.c: Correct: PIR detects infrared emitted by human bodies.
explanations.d: Incorrect: X-rays are not used in IoT sensors.

questions.question: DHT sensor communicates through which method?

explanations.a: Correct: DHT uses a single-wire digital communication method.
explanations.b: Incorrect: DHT does not use I2C.
explanations.c: Incorrect: SPI is not used here.
explanations.d: Incorrect: UART is used in serial devices.

questions.question: Which sensor is used for air quality detection?

explanations.a: Correct: MQ135 detects harmful gases and checks air quality.
explanations.b: Incorrect: PIR is for motion detection.

questions.question: Soil moisture sensor is useful in which IoT domain?

explanations.a: Correct: Used for irrigation and crop monitoring.
explanations.d: Incorrect: PIR and cameras are used in security.
